data.oai_dc:dc: CINMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: San Miguel Island, California, USA (SMSXXX)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at San Miguel Island, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2006-04-10. The instrument depth was 009 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
